title: 多人游戏经**开连接
author: 懒叶KING
txt_content:
玩着玩着忽然断开连接提示:Inter exception: java.net.SocketException: Software caused connection abort: socket write error
重新连接后玩了不到2分钟又断开提示:Inter exception: java.net.SocketException: Software caused connection abort:recv failed
我以前在XP玩都没这个问题...重装了个Win7后就这样了QAQ
求高人解答QAQ
